horses are an important part of their culture .

output.sentences: Every one had a great time at the Native American Festival.
There was live music and horse rides.
Some of the Natives showed off their beautiful tattoos to commemorate their heritage.
Non- Natives also showed off their tatoos as well.
The best part of the festival was when they did the rain dance.
